pr_title: [plugin-web-app] Allow empty arguments for click, double click, click and hold and release actions

timeline.message: [plugin-web-app] Allow empty arguments for click, double click, click and hold and release actions
[plugin-web-app] Allow empty arguments for click, double click, click and hold and release actions

timeline.bodyText: and what about not nullable arguments? Shouldn't you notify the user about an invalid argument?
